headline: PayPal Takeover Interest And Asset Sale Talk Reframe Value Debate
summary: PayPal Holdings (NasdaqGS:PYPL) has attracted unsolicited takeover interest, including early stage discussions with peer payments group Stripe. Potential deals under discussion reportedly range from a full company sale to divestitures of key assets such as Venmo and Braintree. These talks are unfolding during a leadership transition and a period of operational challenges for PayPal. For investors, this all comes at a time when PayPal shares trade around $45.53, with the stock showing a 9.3%...
